website_summaries.verdict: Lacks some user-friendly features, but the app, video quality, and WiFi connectivity make this a safe bet.
pros: A rolling robotic monitor that's easy to control remotely with the Family Robot app
Produces video and images with nice clarity
Has a power indicator so you know when it's due to be recharged
cons: Doesn't detect motion or have night vision
Can get hung up on thick-piled carpet

customer_reviews.title: Great little robot.
customer_reviews.text: Great robot! Worked well on both my carpets. You need a strong connection to use it, without a strong connection the following issues have happened: It has lost signal while out, but after returning home and turning it off then back on it worked fine again. When speaking sometimes the sound goes out and won’t return until you close and reopen the app. I really enjoy using this little bot. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Cannot get it to connect
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about this product but I've spent over 3 hours now trying every possible way to get it to connect to the network but it just doesn't work. I can accomplish the first step of the connection but not the second. There is no customer service number, no email and no website so get help if you can... I've contacted the seller so I'll post an update once I get an answer from the seller. So far just a lot of frustration with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Think twice before purchasing
customer_reviews.text: This product is very clumsy does not flow with the motion of the control. Has difficulty moving on carpeting.I would not recommend this product think
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Arena

customer_reviews.title: 6 hour battery life
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute little robot ...it’s got decent controls and it’s got a very sensitive microphone. The camera is 720 so I kinda wish it was HD but it works and the built in torch makes it easy to move around in the dark. I do wish it had motion detection and night vision I just wish it was $20 cheaper. But it works great and moves reasonably well on carpet . Has a 6 HOUR BATTERY LIFE!!!
customer_reviews.author: viley

customer_reviews.title: doesn't reliably connect to wifi network
customer_reviews.text: If this robot were to reliably connect to the wifi network, I'd say that it was a good value. But it doesn't. The two or three times that I actually got it to connect, it was ok -- not great, but kind of what you would expect for under $100. If you have $100 to burn, you can give it a try. But don't have high -- or even reasonable -- expectations. After countless attempts at trying to get it to connect and work, I've given up and shelved it. Eventually it'll go to the electronic waste recycling center.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If I had known ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had known this was charged via a USB type connection, and I would have ordered the plug head it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin E. Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, worked okay when it actually worked
customer_reviews.text: The concept of this is cool however it only worked for one day and does not navigate well on carpet. The app is also very buggy. When it did work, the video quality and audio quality was great. It had some really nice features. But only was able to use it for a day and it stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: David M Burns

customer_reviews.title: Waist of money!
customer_reviews.text: Obviously it's an abandoned product.. It's last app update was in 2017.. It use to be reliable now it's useless.. I was once able to use it threw 4G from FL to WI just a year ago now its connection drops constantly?!! Buy if your SLY!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Star

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Basic technical skills required.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! A nanny cam for my pets during the day. Quick and easy to connect to from the cloud. Easy to maneuver and decent audio/video quality. There were no instructions of any sort in the box. It takes some basic technical skills to setup the first time. I am very satisfied with the product for this price!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff in the Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Cannot get it connected to internet.
customer_reviews.text: Cannot get it connected to wifi through my iphone. Wish I would had tried right after getting it but now it is too lake to return it.
customer_reviews.author: David Lambert

customer_reviews.title: WAS A GIFT
customer_reviews.text: My son ask for this for Christmas so it was shipped direct to him . He seems to really like it and also having fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it came on time and works good but its not made very well, my daughter broke the right wheel off with one good pull..
customer_reviews.author: Paul W Sano

customer_reviews.title: My Cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep up with my cat and to entertain. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: G-Man

customer_reviews.title: Best monitoring camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing for the price. I use it to check on my dogs when I'm away. I have used most of the pet cameras on the market and this one is definitely the best since I can move it around to find them and play with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Unable to connect to home wifi network with Family Robot App
customer_reviews.text: Was able to use Pixel2 and Galaxy S9 to connect to the robot, but the robot was unable to connect to our home wifi network. It looks to be an issue with the app.
customer_reviews.author: Matty Ice

customer_reviews.title: Laggy and will timeout all the time
customer_reviews.text: This may work for a week but the app is very laggy. Buy another product. I'm on day 32 and now I cant return it.
customer_reviews.author: jerome e floyd

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to connect
customer_reviews.text: Cannot connect to my wifi network, it doesn't give me options to choose. Trying to contact CS but nobody answer. I've followed the special tips but nothing
customer_reviews.author: Patricio Nardo

customer_reviews.title: Night vision
customer_reviews.text: It does okay it does not track equally it turns to the right as you're going straight Night vision could be a little better It's fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Watt

customer_reviews.title: How to fix this
customer_reviews.text: It just stop charging at all and I cnr even charge it directly I have to use the base ,, tried all cables all ways of charging but nothing worked I juts used it for one day!!
customer_reviews.author: ahmed

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Product works, but no night vision and no motion detection
customer_reviews.author: ballpengod
